ImprovementType.Description: The Arena gives units stationed in the city it's constructed in bonus experience.

GameModifier.Provides: +1 XP per Season for Stationed Trained Units
+1 XP per Season for Stationed Champions
+1 Plate Smithing Power to Stationed Champions

ImprovementType.Description: Construct the Forge of the Overlord to be able to cast the Spell of Making and take control of the magical energies of Elemental.

GameModifier.Provides: Allows the player to cast the Spell of Making
+1 Plate Smithing Power to Stationed Champions

ImprovementType.Description: The War College greatly increases the quality of all units trained in the city it's built in while reducing their training costs. In addition, any trained units stationed in the city with your War College will have a chance to gain free experience every Season.

GameModifier.Provides: Trained units get +25% Attack vs units of the opposite race
+1 XP per Season for Stationed Trained Units

ImprovementType.Description: Warrior Temples increase the quality of all units trained in the city they're built in while reducing their training costs. In addition, any trained units stationed in cities with Warrior Temples will have a chance to gain free experience every Season.

GameModifier.Provides: Trained Units get +25% Attack vs damaged enemies
+1 XP per Season for Stationed Trained Units
+1 Plate Smithing Power to Stationed Champions

Animal experimenting facilities improve the Research of the city they are attached to.
Banks allow the nation to gain interest on all Gildar it has saved up.
!SHENANIGANS!
Allows shipbuilding. Can only be built on Beaches.
An Expansion Bureau is needed to plan your takeover of Elemental as well as to train and outfit Pioneers.
Merchant Banks allow the nation to gain interest on all Gildar it has saved up.
Equine Farms can be built on Wild Horses to provide 30 Food for the connected city.
Trapper Camps can be built on Wild Wargs to provide 20 Food for the connected city.
Packhorse Stables improve the Production of the city they are attached to.

Recommended by a trusted soldier who was himself sent there by his wife's sister to get some miraculous ointments, it is an unremarkable teepee.
Requires a Swamp Terrain. Requires an Infirmary.

Next Ayahuasca Seminar: Sunday evening.
Requires a Mining Guild.
These short-range teleport pads allow your peons to easily cross rivers, extending your city limits across said river and increasing trade with neighbors.

Fafnir camp can be built on the Fafnir Antre to recruit Fafnir.
Lava Dragon Camp can be built on Lava Dragon Dens to recruit Lava Dragons.

GameModifier.Provides: Can recruit up to 3 Lava Dragons

ImprovementType.Description: Legendary Worm Hole can be built on the Legendary Worm Antre to recruit a Legendary Worm.

ImprovementType.Description: Deorcnysse.

High in the lofty mountains stands the Great Temple of Air, open to the sky and all its thunderous power. Here its magic is harness and funneled out to its followers, the lesser images of the race that vanished many years ago.

In the bones of the land, lies the great and ancient nexus of Earth. Its Temple serves as the focal point of the worship of Earth. Legends tell of a time when the creators will be called back, when the Stone Giants will walk Elemental again.

Over the blazing inferno that is an active volcano, the Great Temple of Fire is built. The ruinous powers of The ancient Fire Giants is here, deep in the core of the world, ready to be called forth to lay waste to Elemental.

The Tower of the Magi increases the Magic Resistance of all Units produced in this City and protects the City from the Spells of enemy casters.
